zuul.timerunner.pkg_others

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • zuul.timerunner.pkg_others.Character

  • public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Character are non player entity. They can move and talk.
    Author:
    ASTIER Naji & ROBIN Yohann
